author: zahary.
content: Just to verify my understand of the light client spec, is the idea that all validators in the sync committee will gossip a signature over every block they see on the network? And the regular block proposers will be required to aggregate the sigantures in time and include them in the block, thus allowing light client updates to be generated for any target block?

author: ralexstokes
content: of course, it can scale to any subset of the current committee (not blocked on _every_ member of the committee, e.g.)

author: ralexstokes
content: and if required we can introduce some kind of aggregation scheme like we do for attestations so that there is less load on the proposer
